data.name: InvocationInfo
desc: This struct is used to specify information about object members (methods or properties) accessed via XInvocation, such as names, types, or parameters.

properties.name: aName
desc: Name of the method or property.

properties.name: eMemberType
desc: Kind of the member (method or property).

properties.name: PropertyAttribute
desc: Only for property members: This field may contain zero or more constants of the com.sun.star.beans.PropertyAttribute constants group.

It is not guaranteed that all necessary constants are set to describe the property completely, but a flag will only be set, if the corresponding charac- teristic really exists. Example: If the READONLY flag is set, the property is readonly. If it isn't set, the property nevertheless can be readonly.
For methods this field is irrelevant and is set to 0.

properties.name: aType
desc: Type of the member, for methods the return type.

types.name: aParamTypes
desc: Types method parameters, for properties this sequence is empty.

types.name: aParamModes
desc: Mode of method parameters (IN, OUT, INOUT), for properties this sequence is empty.
